name: @danielkalen/simplythread
description: JS Threads: Run arbitrary functions in immediatly-spawned browser threads with an async workflow

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run super-minify
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:test
scripts.compile:js: foreach -g 'src/coffee/*.coffee' -x 'simplyimport -i {{path}} | coffee -b -s -c > dist/{{name}}.pretty.js && uglifyjs dist/{{name}}.pretty.js -m -c keep_fargs,unused=false -o dist/{{name}}.js'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js && npm run watch:test
scripts.measure: npm run measure:pretty -s && npm run measure:minified -s

author: Daniel Kalen
